description: Straw is dried stalks of grain often used for thatching, packing, weaving, and in fire training scenarios.
short desc: Straw is dried stalks of grain.
source: Collected from a fire service training ground.

measured property.test description: Simultaneous thermal analyzer experiments were conducted at three heating rates: 3 K/min, 10 K/min, and 30 K/min.
Micro-scale combustion calorimeter tests were conducted at a heating rate of 30 K/min.

derived property.test description: Effective heat of combustion [MJ/kg] is calculated from data collected in micro-scale combustion calorimeter experiments.
